title: Ku deeq Macbadka Orbital
heading: Dhameystir deeqdaada
chooseHow: Dooro sida aad jeceshahay inaad u dhamaystirto deeqdaada cashuurta laga jaray:

option1.heading: Xulashada 1: Ku Deeq Online Hadda
option1.description: Ku dhammaystir deeqdaada isla markaaba addoo isticmaalaya kaarka deynta, kaarka deynta, ama hababka kale ee lacag bixinta onlaynka ah iyada oo loo marayo kafiilkeena maaliyadeed ee sugan, Goobta . Waxaad heli doontaa rasiidh cashuureed degdeg ah
option1.button: Ku tabaruc iyada oo loo marayo Goobta →

option2.heading: Doorashada 2: Deposit Bank ee Roy Foundation
option2.description: Samee deebaaji toos ah bangiga ama wareejinta siligga Roy Foundation , lammaaneheena istaraatiijiga ah iyo kafaala-qaadka maaliyadeed. Doorashadani waxay ku habboon tahay deeqaha waaweyn ama wareejinta caalamiga ah.
option2.instructions: Fadlan ku dar " Macbadka Orbital - {donationType} " goobta tixraaca. Kadib markaad dhamaystirto wareejintaada, noogu soo dir emailka sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art faahfaahintaada wareejinta si aad u hesho risiidhkaaga cashuurta.
option2.button: Nagala Soo Xidhiidh Wixii Ku Saabsan Debaajiga →

taxInfo.heading: Bixinta Cashuur-jarida
taxInfo.description: Orbital Temple waa mashruuc dhaqaale ahaan la kafaalo qaado ee The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , 501(c)(3) urur aan faa'iido doon ahayn. Dhammaan tabarucaada Maraykanku waa cashuur-jaris ilaa xadka sharcigu ogolyahay.
